question: The Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) has recently approved the membership of which of the following nations?
explanation: The Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) has recently approved the membership of Argentina, the Republic of Madagascar and the Kingdom of Tonga at its 2nd annual meeting of Board of Governors in Jeju, South Korea, June 16, 2017.  The three prospective members will officially join the AIIB once they complete the required domestic processes and deposit the first installment of capital with the bank. The 2017 AIIB annual meeting was held under the theme of \"Sustainable Infrastructure,\" seeking strategic directions of the international infrastructure bank and making major decisions on the bank\'s management.
